abstract: SoftBank raises its takeover bid for Sprint Nextel to $21.6 billion. | The big tech companies walk a tightrope in their responses to the revelations about government surveillance. | Brokers are making efforts to remove negative information from their records. | Bank governance has become a critical issue in Greece.
